title: How to Create a Shared Album in Facebook

steps.headline: Log in to your Facebook account.
Choose one of the albums you created.
Go to the top left corner and click the "Make Shared Album" button.
Add the names of who could see, upload and edit photos of the album to the Contributors list.
Go to the privacy section.

text:
Log in to your Facebook account. Go to Photos. Choose one of the albums you created. Go to the top left corner and click the "Make Shared Album" button. Add the names of who could see, upload and edit photos of the album to the Contributors list. Go to the privacy section. There are three options: Public,Friends of Contributors and contributors only. Contributors only: People tagged and added contributors could view the album. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/4e/Create-a-Shared-Album-in-Facebook-Step-6Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Create-a-Shared-Album-in-Facebook-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/4/4e/Create-a-Shared-Album-in-Facebook-Step-6Bullet1.jpg/aid3280767-v4-728px-Create-a-Shared-Album-in-Facebook-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":190,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"300","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Friends of Contributors: Contributors, people tagged and the friends of people tagged could view the photos of album. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/84/Create-a-Shared-Album-in-Facebook-Step-6Bullet2.jpg/v4-460px-Create-a-Shared-Album-in-Facebook-Step-6Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/8/84/Create-a-Shared-Album-in-Facebook-Step-6Bullet2.jpg/aid3280767-v4-728px-Create-a-Shared-Album-in-Facebook-Step-6Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":200,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"317","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Public: Anyone may be able to see the photos. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/18/Create-a-Shared-Album-in-Facebook-Step-6Bullet3.jpg/v4-460px-Create-a-Shared-Album-in-Facebook-Step-6Bullet3.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/1/18/Create-a-Shared-Album-in-Facebook-Step-6Bullet3.jpg/aid3280767-v4-728px-Create-a-Shared-Album-in-Facebook-Step-6Bullet3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":195,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"309","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Click on "Save."
